explains: adj. 被压倒的，被淹没的；（强烈地影响而使） 不知所措的
v. （情感）难以禁受；使应接不暇；淹没，漫过（overwhelm 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The army was overwhelmed by the rebels.
sentences.cn: 军队被叛乱者完全击败了。

sentences.en: A deep sense of despair overwhelmed him.
sentences.cn: 深深的绝望使他痛苦不堪。

sentences.en: She was overwhelmed by feelings of guilt.
